## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9b798bc5312e2cdb16a12e65a8a02a2a447f4af87bc9132258961b27b2314b60)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ing-feat-grants-management' @ 999.100.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
